item.description:
It was only a matter of time: somebody comes along and decides to teach the warring barbarians how to behave like decent human beings. They may be in charge now, but old habits die hard. Players will take up foam swords and engage each other in battle- but be careful, the imperials have ways of dealing with those who don’t behave themselves! This 2 hour event is intended for ages 6 to adult. Bring your very best manners, and then get ready to throw them away when the imperials aren’t looking!


Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Buddy Night: Civilized Company
